stories.title: The startup SquarEat makes eating more efficient by turning foods into squares
Britain Shouldn't Join a EU Army

stories.text:
IMPORTANT NOTICE TO ALL YOU OLD FOGIES RUNNING COMPANIES:

"Teams" are now gone. Instead, you now have "Squads".

"Divisions" are now gone. Instead, you now have "Tribes".

So, you might for example have your "Squad of Development Ninjas, who belong to the "Information Technology Tribe".

Or, you might have your "Squad of Support Rockstars", who belong to your "Customer Service Tribe".

You old managers - please update yourselves and your organisation charts ASAP or risk not being able to hire anyone new because your organisation is so old and behind the times.

Keep this handy reference when trying to work out your new company structure:

teams out, squads in. divisions out, tribes in.

If you think this is silly and wanky then it might be time for you to retire. Get hip to the scene, you crazy cats.
stories.title: Tell HN: Important Notice to All You Old Fogies Running Companies
Hit by Ida, New Orleans faces weeks without power

stories.text:
VeriSign's price increase goes in effect September 1, 2021. This increase likely will be passed on by your registrar.

Good time to remind everyone that VeriSign has a monopoly granted by ICANN to raise prices indefinitely with zero competition.
stories.title: Remind HN: .com prices increase Sep 1, 2021
